oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Interview - the Statler Brothers - 2010-06-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interview with the Statler Brothers in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 3, 2010. Companion to a Statler Brothers exhibit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Statler Brothers;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Includes questions from audience. Interview conducted by John Rumble with Phil Balsley, Don Reid, Harold Reid, and Jimmy Fortune. Includes recorded audio excerpts and audio from video.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Statler Brothers; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
